title: What is being built in the old Rock Ola Cafe on College Road in the Sam\'s/Lowes parking lot?
text:
Battleground Restaurant Group of Greensboro has confirmed plans for
its casual, sports-oriented Kickback Jacks in the old Rockola Cafe,
418 S. College Road. Expect ribs, wings, burgers and pizza.



http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110811/COLUMNIST/110819952?p=all&tc=pgall
